Interfaces

Interface ControlCenterInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface ControlCenterInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Control Center interface to implement the stub for other entities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • summonHorsesToPaddock

        void summonHorsesToPaddock()
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Waits for all spectators to go to the paddock. Only returns when all spectators are on paddock. Also resets the number of horses that have finished the race.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • startTheRace

        void startTheRace()
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Start race and wait for all horses finish the race. Ony returns when all horses have finished the race.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • reportResults

        void reportResults()
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Report results about the race that occurred and notify the spectators.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • areThereAnyWinners

        boolean areThereAnyWinners(java.util.ArrayList<SerializableHorse> winners,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Bet> betList)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Check if any spectator won money with its bet.
        Parameters:
        winners - list of the winner horses
        betList - list of bets made by the spectators on the race
        Returns:
        true if any spectator has won the bet, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • endRaces

        void endRaces()
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Tells the spectator that races have ended.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • proceedToPaddock

        void proceedToPaddock(int id)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Horse proceeds to paddock. Increments the number of horses in the paddock and notifies the spectators of next race if all horses are on the paddock.
        Parameters:
        id - spectator id
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • horseOutOfPaddock

        void horseOutOfPaddock()
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Horse got out of paddock.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • atTheFinishLine

        void atTheFinishLine(int id)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Horse goes to the finish line.
        Parameters:
        id - horse id
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • waitForNextRace

        boolean waitForNextRace(int id)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Spectator waits for the next race. Waits that all horses reach the paddock, if there is a next race. Returns false if there is no next race.
        Parameters:
        id - spectator id
        Returns:
        true if there is a next race, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • goCheckHorses

        void goCheckHorses(int id)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Notify the broker that all spectators are on the paddock.
        Parameters:
        id - spectator id
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • goWatchTheRace

        void goWatchTheRace()
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Spectator goes to watch the race. Waits for the broker to report the results of a race.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • relaxABit

        void relaxABit(int id)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Spectator relaxes after the races.
        Parameters:
        id - spectator id
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • haveIWon

        boolean haveIWon(int id,
                 java.util.ArrayList<SerializableHorse> winnerPositions,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Bet> betList)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Checks if the spectator has won the bet.
        Parameters:
        id - spectator id
        winnerPositions - list of the winner horses
        betList - list of bets made by the spectators on the race
        Returns:
        true if the spectator won the bet, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • serviceEnd

        void serviceEnd()
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Stop the service and shuts down the shared region.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
